description: Uzawa Mifuyu is http://anidb.net/ch1193 [Sachiko]`s classmate. She is shown as having a stalker-like attraction to Sachiko, due to the events that happened during their kindergarten days. After witnessing http://anidb.net/ch1192 [Yumi]`s genuine affection towards Sachiko during Valentines day, she gave up on her obsession.
name: Uzawa Mifuyu
